mapper.select: select no, title, writer, contact, age, breed, location, gender, img, thumbimg, missingdate, name, dpchknum from missingboard order by registerdate desc limit #{startNum}, #{postPerPage}
mapper.insert: insert into missingboard(title, writer, password, animal, breed, name, age, gender, location, dlocation, contents, contact, img, thumbimg, missingdate) values (#{title}, #{writer}, sha1(md5(#{password})), #{animal}, #{breed}, #{name}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{location}, #{dlocation}, #{contents}, #{contact}, #{img}, #{thumbimg}, #{missingdate})
mapper.update: update missingboard set title=#{title}, animal=#{animal}, breed=#{breed}, name=#{name}, age=#{age}, gender=#{gender}, location=#{location}, dlocation=#{dlocation}, contents=#{contents}, contact=#{contact}, img=#{img}, thumbimg=#{thumbimg}, missingdate=#{missingdate} where no = #{no}
